summary: Uuno's nose is proved to be so good, that he can smell behind the display window what goods are on the other side. With this fabulous smell talent Uuno is chosen to Police's police-dog ... See full summary »
cast: Vesa-Matti Loiri|Marjatta Raita|Elli Castrén|Tapio Hämäläinen|Pentti Siimes|Simo Salminen|Spede Pasanen|Olavi Ahonen|Ville-Veikko Salminen|Marita Nordberg|Klaus Thomasson|Aapo Vilhunen|Helena Notkonen|Esko Mattila|Juhani Kumpulainen|Aarno Sulkanen|Tuija Ahvonen
title: Uuno Turhapuron aviokriisi
